name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Backend Engineer with 10+ years of experience specializing in **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, and **PostgreSQL**. Proficient in designing and implementing **event-driven systems** and **clean architectures** that enhance application performance and maintainability. Strong expertise in testing strategies and domain-driven design, ensuring high-quality deliverables while adhering to best practices.
Demonstrated ability to collaborate effectively across teams, mentoring junior developers and fostering a positive team environment. Brings a proven track record of building secure applications that meet stringent compliance standards, with hands-on experience in **JavaScript**, **Python**, and **cloud-native technologies** on **Azure** and **AWS**. A dedicated professional with a passion for driving impactful solutions in complex environments.

experience.responsibilities:

•	Utilized **PostgreSQL** for developing cloud-native data architecture optimized for large-scale data processing and querying, achieving efficient performance in healthcare and financial applications.
•	Applied **clean architectures** principles to lead the re-architecture of monolithic applications into microservices-based ecosystems, leveraging **Docker** and **Kubernetes (AKS/EKS)** for improved maintainability and deployability.
•	Established comprehensive **testing strategies** across front-end and backend services, effectively using Jest, Cypress, PyTest, and Postman to achieve 100% unit and integration test coverage.
•	Collaborated with cross-functional teams effectively, enhancing **collaboration** and **communication** across development and operations, contributing to a cohesive development environment.
•	Mentored junior team members in best practices of **domain-driven design**, aiding in their professional growth and aligning team efforts to project goals.
•	Developed advanced event-driven systems using industry-standard frameworks, ensuring prompt and reliable system interactions in various applications.
•	Facilitated the deployment of enterprise-level **DevOps** pipelines using **GitHub Actions** and **Azure DevOps**, achieving continuous integration and delivery cycles of less than **2 hours**.
•	Implemented cutting-edge functionalities by integrating AI-based features into applications, leveraging data science tools and frameworks to achieve exceptional user experiences.
•	Delivered insights through complex financial data visualization tools utilizing **D3.js**, achieving real-time insights into transaction trends and reducing fraud detection times by **30%**.

• Demonstrated **Backend expertise** through the development of scalable financial platforms leveraging a microservices-based architecture with **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, resulting in a **30% increase** in transaction throughput.
• Utilized **TypeScript** in conjunction with **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, and **Next.js** to build user-focused front-end applications, enhancing user experience by **25%** on financial dashboards and admin portals.
• Championed the implementation of **Event-driven systems** using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, significantly improving asynchronous communication and real-time event processing for **over 1 million transactions** daily.
• Applied **PostgreSQL** in the development of robust data solutions to store and manage financial data, ensuring a **99.9% uptime** and reliability for critical operations.
• Executed **Clean architectures** and established **Testing strategies** to maintain high code quality across applications, with unit and integration tests achieving **85%** coverage.
• Implemented **Domain-driven design** to foster collaboration and streamline project workflows, facilitating effective communication among cross-functional teams.
• Provided **Mentorship** to junior developers, promoting best practices in coding and system design, leading to a **40% improvement** in their development speed and output quality.

• Leveraged **Node.js** (NestJS, Express) and **TypeScript** to design and optimize backend services, ensuring high availability, low latency, and scalability for a global e-commerce platform with over **100,000** daily transactions.
• Engineered robust event-driven systems using **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, enabling real-time order updates and customer support, which resulted in a **30%** increase in customer satisfaction rates.
• Developed and maintained clean architectures to facilitate high-quality code and improve overall system performance across various backend services.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement testing strategies, enhancing software reliability and reducing bug reports by **25%**.
• Integrated **PostgreSQL** alongside **MongoDB**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra** for efficient distributed data management, successfully handling spikes in traffic during peak sales events, and achieving **99.9%** uptime.
• Conducted mentorship sessions for junior developers, fostering a collaborative work environment and promoting best practices in backend development and design.
• Actively participated in regular communication with stakeholders to align backend development efforts with business objectives and ensure timely delivery of features.
• Practiced domain-driven design principles to elevate the overall architecture quality, which led to a **40%** reduction in development time for new features.
